name: Beast Pets
detailed_description:
Where to Play

Beast Pets is currently in Beta and not yet available on Steam's general storefront, but there are other ways to play!

If you operate a VR arcade:


Commercial licensing is available through: SpringboardVR / PrivateLabelVR / SynthesisVR / Viveport Arcade. Beast Pets is optimized for the arcade experience and players will typically spend between 10-30 minutes petting flying puppy dragons :)

If you have a Vive at home:

Please send an email to beta@beastpets.com with your Steam ID to request a beta key!

If you don't have a Vive at home:

Beast Pets is available at select VR arcades in the US and Canada. Check out the dragon sightings map to see if there's a Beast-friendly arcade near you.


About the Game



Hi! We are a startup based in San Francisco, and our job is to take care of smart and magical creatures that live in virtual reality called Beast Pets.

We are currently raising a litter of baby Woodland Dragons, one of the cuddliest dragon species you will ever meet. They're really pretty much flying puppy-kittens who want to nuzzle you!

Come play with our baby dragons in Beast Park, where you can tease them with laser pointers or play fetch. Once the babies are a little bit older, you'll bring able to take them on field trips to explore mysterious realms outside of Beast Park.

We're adding more toys, gadgets, and powers all the time, and we want to hear from you what you'd like to play with!

short_description: Beast Pets are smart and magical pets that live in virtual reality. Come play with cute baby dragons that behave like flying puppies! Beast Pets are friendly for all ages and perfect for families trying VR for the first time. This app is currently in Beta.
reviews:
“Beast may be the life bringing app for VR that shows jaded techies how much humanity and empathy can be felt when transported to a virtual world.”
- Bobby Venom, Cats and VR

“Beast has potential to become one of those crossover hits that brings non-hardcore gamers into the space.”
- Aaron Stanton, Executive Producer of QuiVR

“Ridiculously adorable dragons and emotionally compelling experience.”
- Ilya Druzhnikov, Founder of Exit Reality

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 equivalent or higher
